app.name: gridX Health Check
app.short_description: Runs Health Checks on a gridBox
app.long_description: To help diagnose issues with gridBoxes, you can run checks on any gridBox identified by its serial number. New checks will be made available continuously
app.installation_instructions: Configure the following app settings, then click Install:...
app.title: gridX Health Check

gridXApiToken.label: gridX API Token
gridXApiToken.helpText: gridX API organizational token to use. Needs to have the 'health-check:RequestCheck' permission.

gridXSerialNumberFieldId.label: gridBox Serial Number Field ID
gridXSerialNumberFieldId.helpText: The Zendesk custom field ID that holds the gridBox serial number in tickets. Optional.

debug.label: Enable debugging
debug.helpText: Write additional debug information to the browser development console.

serial.label: Gateway S/N
serial.invalid: Gateway S/N must be a valid gridBox serial number

system_id.label: System UUID
system_id.invalid: System UUID must be a valid UUID
